item.title: fail2ban
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I need to find out a good configuration to fail2ban attackers who targeting my blog, I checked log and found that 404 may not be a good indicator as some themes have 404 for all the time, I will check to see if I can use non-media resources to do rate-limit like solution.
item.content:encoded: I need to find out a good configuration to fail2ban attackers who targeting my blog, I checked log and found that 404 may not be a good indicator as some themes have 404 for all the time, I will check to see if I can use non-media resources to do rate-limit like solution.

item.title: My site is back
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: There were some problems with China Telecom in the past several days, I could not access my blog site for almost a week. However, there was no problem if I went through China Mobile or China Unicom. It seems China Telecom blocked access to several the GoDaddy DNS servers, I don’t know the exact reason [...]
item.content:encoded:
There were some problems with China Telecom in the past several days, I could not access my blog site for almost a week. However, there was no problem if I went through China Mobile or China Unicom.

It seems China Telecom blocked access to several the GoDaddy DNS servers, I don’t know the exact reason behind the scene, but obviously there were something …

Anyway, good to see my site’s back.

item.title: New domain
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Got a new domain (transferred from previous Windows Live free domain registry), but not sure what I’m going to do with it. Could be another blog and some testing – after I started doing this English blogging, I found that less Chinese came to read. There are still some good technology that I want to [...]
item.content:encoded:
Got a new domain (transferred from previous Windows Live free domain registry), but not sure what I’m going to do with it.

Could be another blog and some testing – after I started doing this English blogging, I found that less Chinese came to read. There are still some good technology that I want to discuss in Chinese, or let’s say, get them to be known in China, so running a Chinese blog could be a good idea.

Anything else than that does not make too much sense at this moment. Godaddy’s Python is still at 2.4, I don’t think I can play with Python there, and I don’t have any other hosting plan yet, maybe I should shop around.

item.title: Test from Yahoo Mail
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Yahoo mail is trying to do something similar to Microsoft’s Live Writer, let’s see how it works …
item.content:encoded: Yahoo mail is trying to do something similar to Microsoft’s Live Writer, let’s see how it works …
